trans-unit.source: Represents a callback delegate that has been registered with a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示已向 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> 登錄的回呼委派。

trans-unit.source: The callback is called when the token is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 當取消語彙基元時，會呼叫回呼。

trans-unit.source: To unregister a callback, dispose the corresponding Registration instance.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消註冊回呼，處置對應的註冊執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For more information and code examples see [Cancellation in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊和程式碼範例，請參閱[Managed 執行緒中的取消](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md)。

trans-unit.source: All public and protected members of <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of Dispose, which must only be used when all other operations on the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> have completed.
trans-unit.target: 所有的 public 和 protected 成員的<see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />是安全執行緒，而且可用來同時從多個執行緒，除了 Dispose，才必須是會使用上的所有其他作業<see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />已完成。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration>.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration>。

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 方法會將 <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration>所佔用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration>.
trans-unit.target: 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instance is equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> 執行個體與指定的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> 是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The other object to which to compare this instance.
trans-unit.target: 要與這個執行個體比較的其他物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instance is equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> 執行個體與指定的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> 是否相等。

trans-unit.source: True, if both this and <paramref name="obj" /> are equal.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行個體和 <paramref name="obj" /> 相等則為 True，

trans-unit.source: False, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 否則為 False。

trans-unit.source: Two <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instances are equal if they both refer to the output of a single call to the same Register method of a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> 執行個體都參考 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> 的相同 Register 方法之單一呼叫的輸出，則這兩個執行個體相等。

trans-unit.source: The other <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> to which to compare this instance.
trans-unit.target: 要與這個執行個體比較的其他 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instance is equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> 執行個體與指定的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> 是否相等。

trans-unit.source: True, if both this and <paramref name="other" /> are equal.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行個體和 <paramref name="other" /> 相等則為 True，

trans-unit.source: False, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 否則為 False。

trans-unit.source: Two <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instances are equal if they both refer to the output of a single call to the same Register method of a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> 執行個體都參考 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> 的相同 Register 方法之單一呼叫的輸出，則這兩個執行個體相等。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />.
trans-unit.target: 做為 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> 的雜湊函式。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> 執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The first instance.
trans-unit.target: 第一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second instance.
trans-unit.target: 第二個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> 執行個體是否相等。

trans-unit.source: True if the instances are equal; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行個體相等，則為 true；否則為 false。

trans-unit.source: The first instance.
trans-unit.target: 第一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second instance.
trans-unit.target: 第二個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> 執行個體是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: True if the instances are not equal; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行個體不相等，則為 true；否則為 false。
